thread.title: Lady Gaga Is Reportedly Replacing Beyoncé at Coachella!
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga Is Reportedly Replacing Beyoncé at Coachella!

author: Ryan Roschke
title: Lady Gaga Is Reportedly Replacing Beyoncé at Coachella!
text:
Lady Gaga Headlining Coachella 2017 Instead of Beyonce Lady Gaga Is Reportedly Replacing Beyoncé at Coachella! February 28, 2017 by Ryan Roschke 191 Shares 
On Tuesday, Lady Gaga basically saved this year's Coachella lineup. Beyoncé tragically dropped out of the festival due to her recently announced pregnancy , and Mother Monster is stepping in. The Hollywood Reporter claims the pop star is finalizing plans to perform and will make it official in the days to come. The gig will be perfect for Gaga, seeing as she has already announced a world tour for her new album, Joanne , right after her showstopping Super Bowl performance . Get your paws up, because Coachella is about to be overrun by Little Monsters.
